error_esc_state.name: ESC state error. Turn off the aicraft and restart it. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restarting.
error_esc_state.name_spanish: Error de estado ESC. Apague la aeronave y reiníciela. Contacte con DJI Support si esto continua después de reiniciar.

error_esc_(MOTOR)_throttle_lost.name: Motor (SAME[MOTOR]) throttle signal lost. Stop the flight immediately.
error_esc_(MOTOR)_throttle_lost.name_spanish: Señal de acelerador del motor (SAME[MOTOR]) perdida. Detenga el vuelo inmediatamente.

error_esc_(MOTOR)_backup_throttle_lost.name: Motor (SAME[MOTOR]) backup throttle signal lost. Stop the flight immediately.
error_esc_(MOTOR)_backup_throttle_lost.name_spanish: Se ha perdido el acelerador de repuesto del motor (SAME[MOTOR]). Detenga el vuelo inmediatamente.

error_esc_(MOTOR)_throttle_cycle_excepti.name: Motor (SAME[MOTOR]) throttle cycle exception
error_esc_(MOTOR)_throttle_cycle_excepti.name_spanish: Excepción de ciclo de acelerador del motor (SAME[MOTOR])

error_motor_(MOTOR)_jammed.name: Motor (SAME[MOTOR]) jammed. Stop the flight immediately.
error_motor_(MOTOR)_jammed.name_spanish: Motor (SAME[MOTOR]) atascado. Detenga el vuelo inmediatamente.

error_arm_(ARM)_not_securely_fastened.name: Aircraft arm (SAME[ARM]) not securely fastened
error_arm_(ARM)_not_securely_fastened.name_spanish: El brazo (SAME[ARM]) no está bien sujeto

error_battery_connector_overheated.name: Battery connector overheated. Replace the battery, and clean or replace the interface panel.
error_battery_connector_overheated.name_spanish: Conector de batería sobrecalentado. Reemplace la batería, y limpie o reemplace el panel de la interfaz de...

error_battery_flight_controller_communic.name: Communication error between flight controller and battery
error_battery_flight_controller_communic.name_spanish: Error de comunicación entre el controlador de vuelo y la batería

error_battery_authentication_failed.name: Battery authentication failed
error_battery_authentication_failed.name_spanish: Ha fallado la autenticación de la batería

error_battery_self_check.name: Battery self-check error. Do not take off.
error_battery_self_check.name_spanish: Error de comprobación automática de la batería. No despegue.

error_battery_voltage.name: Battery voltage error
error_battery_voltage.name_spanish: Error de voltaje de la batería

error_battery_voltage_too_low.name: Battery voltage too low. Emergency landing in progress.
error_battery_voltage_too_low.name_spanish: Salida de voltaje de la batería demasiado baja. Aterrizaje forzoso en curso.

error_battery_voltage_too_high.name: Battery voltage too high. Emergency landing in progress.
error_battery_voltage_too_high.name_spanish: Salida de voltaje de la batería demasiado alta. Aterrizaje forzoso en curso.

error_battery_maintenance_required.name: Battery maintenance required
error_battery_maintenance_required.name_spanish: Se requiere mantenimiento de la batería

error_abnormal_vibration.name: Abnormal vibration on the aircraft arms. Crash risk. Immediate maintenance required.
error_abnormal_vibration.name_spanish: Vibración anormal en los brazos del bastidor. Riesgo de choque. Se requiere mantenimiento inmediato.
